description: Uchiha Sasuke is a rival and foil to the series` titular character, Uzumaki Naruto. Sasuke is a member of the Uchiha clan, a highly skilled clan of ninjas allied to the village of Konohagakure. His primary motivation throughout the series is to avenge the destruction of his entire clan by killing his brother, Uchiha Itachi, a task he pursues at all costs. While he was initially cold and singularly driven by his revenge, he becomes more empathetic through his relationships with other characters, notably Uzumaki Naruto, whom he comes to consider as a rival.
name: Uchiha Sasuke
